name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - C  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these is a Hallmark Gold Crown exclusive?
questions.explanation:
Candy Canes.

	Candy Canes is a bear covered with candy canes.  The bear has the number 2007 on his foot, and has a red and white bow tied around his neck. "We've wrapped our presents with great care Made cookies, cakes and treats to share Now the only thing we've left to do Is say, 'Happy Holidays to you !'"

questions.text: Which of these animals is Canyon?
questions.correct: All of these - they all mean the same thing.
questions.explanation:
All of these - they all mean the same thing.

	All of these terms mean mountain lion.  Canyon is a mountain lion that is mainly gray with white and black on they ears and face. "I climb rocks and really run fastTry to catch me, it's a blastThrough the mountains, I used to roamNow in your room, I'll call home!"

questions.text: Which of these dogs looks very similar to its brothers Bounds, Chaser, and Diggidy?
questions.explanation:
Cargo.

	Cargo the dog looks very similar to Bounds, Chaser, and Diggidy, except for three things.  He is all white, has softer fabric, and does not wear a bow. "Other dogs may like some kibbleNot me, I won't even nibbleSo if you have some time to bakeI'd really like a chocolate cake!"

questions.text: Which of these is a pink cat?
questions.explanation:
Carnation.

	Carnation is a very pink cat.  She also wears a pink bow. "I'm pink, I'm pink, imagine thatA funny color for a catMy favorite flower in creationIs a pretty pink carnation!"

questions.text: Which of these dogs is a border collie?
questions.explanation:
Cassie.

	Champion is a whole series of bears for almost every country where Beanie Babies are sold.  Each are brown bears with the country's flag on the chest.  Cassie, however, is the same type of dog as Lassie, a border collie. "This loyal collie will stay by your sideWhen you're lost, she'll be your guideIf you need her, wherever she roamsJust call out, 'Cassie Come Home!'"

questions.text: Which of the two monkeys is the male in the Beanie Baby "Cheek to Cheek?"
questions.explanation:
The red one.

	Cheek to Cheek is two monkeys that love each other.  The white one wears a bow in her hair, and the red one has a lipstick kiss on his cheek.  Therefore, the red one is most likely to be the male. "As melodic as your favorite tuneAs romantic as the stars and moonMy love for you makes my knees weakSo hold me closely; cheek to cheek!"

questions.text: Which of these is a white mouse?
questions.explanation:
Cheezer.

	Cheezer is a white mouse, and Cheesly is a brown mouse.  Cheesly holds a chunk of cheese, but Cheezer holds nothing. "I hide in holes throughout the day But when night falls I want to play I sneak around and look for cheese So be my friend and help me please!"

questions.text: Which of these is a panda bear?
questions.explanation:
China.

	China the panda bear sits like Sarge the Beanie Baby.  China is a regular panda bear; white and black. "In the mountains you'll find meSitting near a bamboo treeYou'll laugh at such a funny sightI only dress in black and white!"

questions.text: Which of these is a chipmunk?
questions.explanation:
Chipper.

	Chipper sits on all fours, and has a long, bushy tail.  He is brown with a black and white stripe going down each site, like any normal chipmunk. "I'm quick, I'm fast, I don't make a peepBut I love to snuggle when I sleepTake me along when you go playAnd I'll make sure you have a nice day!"

questions.text: Which of these bears is a black version of Aurora?
questions.explanation:
Cinders.

	Cinders is made with the exact design as Aurora, but using black fabric instead of white.  The black, though, almost looks like a very dark purple.  It isn't a true black. "I sleep in caves and in the snow A mountain life is all I know In the spring I wake again And look around for my best friend!"
